name: Reddit Web 2.1
description:
Removed invalid CSS properties and converted them to CSS3 valid properties. Made comment "points" red to stand out, comments now alternate between shades of gray and white with rounded corners.

This is basically a combination of a few styles on this site already, I just merged them into 1 style and did some minor fixes.
additional_info:
10.5.11 update:
Minor RES fixes.
Fixed footer not having white rounded background.

5.31.11 update:
 - Style fixes
 - Removed comment borders and boxes - Use the Reddit Enhancement Suite for better comment boxes.
 - Made things slightly less round for a better look.
 - includes fixes if using RES.
